Description:
zScore
the signed number of standard deviation by which the data point is above the mean value of what is being observed or measured.
Outlier = (zScore(data) > v) OR (zScore(data) > -v)


IQR
Inter-quartile range is the difference between 75th percentile (Q3) and 25th percentiles (Q1)
Outlier = data < (Q1 - v * IQR)) OR (data > (Q3 + 1.5 * IQR))
